Apache 2.4
PHP 5.6.16
XDebug PHP 5.6 VC11 TS

no more PEAR; phpunit done via composer (php bin/composer.phar)
composer used for installing and upgrading Symfony core
no more Zend Optimizer+; included in PHP 5.5+

File variations from zips
vendor/php contains custom php.ini (used for CLI test suite)
vendor/php/ext contains php_xdebug-2.3.2-5.6-vc11
